price: 41. Ma aha hadal gabyaa, yaraa intaad rumeysaan.
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
